title: Agent Marketplace
loadError: Failed to load listings. Please try again.

starred.title: No Starred Agents
starred.body: You haven't starred any agents yet. Browse the marketplace and click the heart icon to save your favorites!

all.title: No Agents Yet
all.body: Be the first to share your amazing agent with the community!

search.body: No agents match your search. Try different keywords or clear filters.

steps.1: Go to the Chat panel and create or edit an agent
steps.2: Make sure your agent has a name, description, and prompt
steps.4: Share your agent with the community!

detail.error: Failed to load agent details. Please try again.

readme.empty: No README provided for this agent.

config.hidden: This agent's configuration is hidden. You can still fork and use it, but you won't be able to view or modify its settings.
config.lockedOwnerNote: This agent is locked. Users who fork it will not be able to see or modify the configuration.

provider.title: LLM Provider Required:
provider.description: You'll need to configure an AI provider (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) to use this agent.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base:
knowledgeBase.description: The original agent uses {{count}} files. These files will be copied to your workspace when you fork this agent.

requirements.none: No special requirements! This agent is ready to use after forking.

aboutForking.title: About Forking
aboutForking.description: Forking creates your own independent copy. Changes won't affect the original agent.

publish.title: Publish to Marketplace
publish.description: Share your agent with the community. You can update or unpublish it anytime.
publish.descriptionUpdate: Create a new version of your agent for the community.

validation.noConfig: Your agent must have a configuration before publishing to the marketplace.

info.title: What gets published:
info.content: Agent configuration (prompt, model, settings), MCP server requirements (names only), and knowledge base structure (including file references).
info.noteContent: Users forking your agent will receive a copy of your knowledge base files.

commitMessage.label: Commit Message
commitMessage.placeholder: Describe what changed in this version (e.g., 'Improved system prompt for better responses', 'Added support for web search')

readme.label: README.md
readme.placeholder: Add comprehensive documentation for your agent... (Markdown supported)
readme.hint: Basic Markdown syntax is supported. This will be displayed on the agent's marketplace page.

publishImmediately.label: Publish Immediately
publishImmediately.description: Make this listing visible in the marketplace right away

preview.title: Preview
preview.name: Name
preview.mcpWarning: ⚠️ Users will need to configure their own MCP connections
preview.knowledgeInfo: ℹ️ Users will receive a copy of these files in their workspace

error.default: Failed to publish agent. Please try again.

forkMode.label: Fork Mode
forkMode.help: Controls what access users have to their forked copy's configuration

simplePromptEditor.label: System Prompt
simplePromptEditor.description: Define how your agent should behave and respond to users.

complexAgent.title: Complex Agent Configuration
complexAgent.description: This agent uses a custom graph configuration. Use the full Workflow Editor to modify its behavior.

config.title: Configuration
config.description: Edit your agent's graph configuration and workflow.
config.error: Failed to update configuration. Please try again.
config.jsonDescription: Edit the raw JSON configuration. Changes will be synced with the visual editor.

forkMode.title: Fork Mode
forkMode.help: Controls what access users have to their forked copy's configuration
forkMode.error: Failed to update fork mode. Please try again.

forkMode.editableDescription: Users can view and modify the configuration

fork.lockedAgentDescription: This agent will be forked in locked mode. You can use it, but the configuration will be hidden and cannot be modified.
fork.editableDescription: Your forked agent will be completely independent. Changes won't affect the original.
